step_heading: Customer Support: Aapki Shopify Safalta Ki Chabi
text: Ek khush customer 10 se zyada customers la sakta hai!  Achi customer service se apne business ko boost karen.

step_heading: Timely Responses: Jawabden jaldi aur sahi
text: Customers ko jaldi aur sahi jawab dena bohat zaroori hai. Unke sawalon ke jawab den aur unki problems solve karen.

step_heading: Product Delivery: Waqt par delivery karein
text: Waqt par product delivery karein aur packaging ko ache se check kar lein.  Late deliveries se customers naraz ho sakte hain.

step_heading: Feedback Lena: Customers se feedback len
text: Customers se feedback len aur apne products ko improve karne ki koshish karen.  Unki raay aapke liye bohat qimeti hai.
